question: India recently voted in favour of a COVID-19 related resolution in which forum?
explanation:
India has voted in favour of a COVID-19 resolution in the U.N. General Assembly (UNGA), along with 168 nations.
The resolution reaffirms international cooperation to respond to COVID. It also acknowledges the WHOâ€™s leadership role during the pandemic. The U.S. and Israel voted against the resolution while Ukraine and Hungary abstained.
